titleSlide.description: Manage paid access to any Telegram social objects (Private/public channel, private/public group, bot) using only one channel. Monetization via TON, USDT, Telegram Stars.

problemsSlide.heading: ‚ùó What problems do we solve?
problemsSlide.currentPainPoints: Current pain points for content creators:
problemsSlide.manualManagement:
Manual subscription management
Creators spend hours manually checking payments and managing access.
problemsSlide.limitedPayments:
Limited payment methods
Most solutions do not support cryptocurrencies popular in the Telegram community.
problemsSlide.noAnalytics:
Lack of analytics
No tools to analyze conversion and optimize content strategy.
problemsSlide.solutionAutomation: 100% automation - From payment to access provision.
problemsSlide.solutionCrypto: Cryptocurrency payments - TON and USDT with minimal fees.
problemsSlide.solutionAnalytics: Detailed analytics - A complete picture of your business.
